str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To notify, command, charge, entreat solemnly. From para and the base of aggelos; to transmit a message, i.e. to enjoin.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.
